item.title: Mazie Hirono biograph
item.description: Senator Mazie Hirono Biograph Senator Mazie Hirono is a Japanese-born American politician and lawyer. She has represented Hawaii as a junior U.S. Senator under the Democrats since 2013. Hirono was previously a member of the Hawaii House of Representatives from 1981 to 1985. She also represented Hawaiiâ€™s 2nd District in the U.S. House of Representatives from 2007 to 2013. Hirono was born in Koori, Fukushima city, Japan, on November 3, 1947.
